devdoc.author: Cooper Labs
devdoc.details: Reference: EIP-2535 DiamondsForked from https://github.com/mudgen/diamond-3/blob/master/contracts/facets/DiamondCutFacet.sol by mudgen

params._calldata: A function call, including function selector and arguments, executed with delegatecall on _init
params._diamondCut: Contains the facet addresses and function selectors
params._init: The address of the contract or facet to execute _calldata

devdoc.title: DiamondCut

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.notice: Add/replace/remove any number of functions and optionally execute a function with delegatecall
